thread.title: CallTeks Expands Innovative Line of Commercial AV, Security Solutions
thread.title_full: CallTeks Expands Innovative Line of Commercial AV, Security Solutions

title: CallTeks Expands Innovative Line of Commercial AV, Security Solutions
text: CallTeks Expands Innovative Line of Commercial AV, Security Solutions October 15, 2015 -- A leading security provider is now offering even more commercial security and networking services. CallTeks, a top provider of security and audio-visual networking solutions, is expanding its line of innovative commercial offerings to bring businesses more options at a better price. For more than two decades, CallTeks has been a leading provider of commercial security solutions in the Phoenix area. From high-tech security systems and CCTV camera networks to fiber optic cabling and phone systems, the company is always looking for new ways to help businesses through technology and communications systems. What sets CallTeks apart is our ability to offer businesses a full range of communication solutions, says CallTeks Partner Nicole Swartwout. This helps the businesses we work with streamline their security, phone systems and network cabling by choosing a single, reputable provider. These options include highly advanced access control systems that allow businesses to control access to any area. This can be done through the use of key fobs, intercom or key cards. CallTeks can even design a custom access control system to integrate seamlessly with CCTV, alarm systems and other networking capabilities. Another example of CallTeks expanding range of advanced, affordable offerings include a recent partnership with Avaya to give customers a virtually endless array of options when it comes to designing custom communications and networking packages. CallTeks is also brining its innovative solutions to the conference room by designing AV conferencing systems that allow companies to meet more effectively while cutting down on travel costs. Video conferencing, conference call capabilities and high-definition digital presentations are all easier to manage than ever before. About CallTeks CallTeks is a leading provider of communications and security solutions for businesses of all sizes. The company specializes in commercial implementation of Access Control, AV Solutions, CCTV, Fiber Optics, Security Systems, and Voice and Data Networking systems. To learn more about CallTeks or to find out about special pricing for businesses, call 1-844-862-0318 . You can also visit the company online at http://www.callteks.com/commercial Media Contact
